sentences.english: They looked upon the creature with a loathing undisguised.
sentences.chinese: 他们流露出明显的厌恶看那动物。

sentences.english: The way some people looked at her face with disgust seemed to dishearten her even more.
sentences.chinese: 一些人用厌恶的目光看她的脸时似乎使她更加沮丧。

sentences.english: Women hate men who can't live without booze, sex and cigars.
sentences.chinese: 女人厌恶离不开烟酒和性的男人。

sentences.english: His long hair and filthy clothes repelled her.
sentences.chinese: 他的长头发和脏衣服使她感到厌恶。

sentences.english: Humans have a natural aversion to those who are ill.
sentences.chinese: 人类对于生病的人有一种天然的厌恶感。

sentences.english: God became so disgusted with the human race that he considered wiping it out.
sentences.chinese: 他因此非常厌恶人类，开始考虑要除灭一切的人类。

sentences.english: No reason for disgust, she intones, no cause for condemnation.
sentences.chinese: 她咏吟道，没必要去厌恶，没理由去责难。

sentences.english: Pessimists give us license to indulge our most misanthropic thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 悲观主义者给了我们沉浸于厌恶人类的思想中的许可。

sentences.english: Her detestation and disgust must have found voice.
sentences.chinese: 她一定会发泄她的厌恶和憎恨的。

sentences.english: More than a catbird hates a cat.
He is still, in the eyes of some, an irredeemable misogynist.
sentences.chinese: 在某些人的眼里，他仍然是个无可救药的厌恶女性者。

sentences.english: She tells me that everyone in the courtroom was consumed with hate.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉我监狱里的人都被认为是厌恶的。

sentences.english: I didn't know whether to feel flattered or disgusted.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否感到受宠若惊或厌恶。

sentences.english: In order to communicate better about fear or not liking something.
sentences.chinese: 这样你就可以更好地表达恐惧或者对某事的厌恶了。

sentences.english: That sort of action disgusts me.
I wonder what made you so misogynistic.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道是什么使得你如此厌恶女人呢？

definition: to loathe/to hate/to abhor/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 e4]
to hate evil/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 wu4]
to be disgusted with/to dislike/bad reaction/antipathy
bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
to despise/to disdain/to look down upon
to resent/to harbor a grudge against/to loathe/resentment/rancor
to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
